history.content: I prefer smaller, unique hotels over big ones. Is there a well-reviewed hotel in Amsterdam that feels more personal and distinctive?

Certainly! Based on the criteria you've mentioned—preferring smaller, unique hotels over large establishments—I would recommend checking out **The Modern Hideaway**. It's located in Zuid Amsterdam and offers a great balance between affordability and uniqueness.
Do you think The Modern Hideaway also offers activities or tours related to the area? That would be really interesting for me.

Yes, The Modern Hideaway does offer some activities and tours related to the area. They include a terrace where you can enjoy views of the city and even provide breakfast in the morning. Additionally, they often organize guided tours around the city, which might interest you depending on your interests.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
